segments.text: Jimmy , I ’ d like to wear this robe for tonight cocktail party . What do you think of it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don ’ t dress like that . You ’ ll make fool yourself . You look stupid in that robe .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What ? But it is my favorite piece of clothing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe it is . But it ’ s out of fashion .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What am I going to do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let ’ s go downtown and pick up some fashionable clothes for you .
segments.speaker: S2
